General.Name: Francaise de l'Energie
General.Description: La Française de l'Energie S.A., a carbon-negative energy producer, focuses on energy recovery and production sites for reducing greenhouse gas emissions in France. The company supplies CO2, gas, electricity, and heat. It has an installed capacity of 7.5 megawatts in Wallonia. La Française de l'Energie S.A. was incorporated in 2007 and is headquartered in Faulquemont, France.
